State.Author: Magnetuning
State.Description: Restores missing dialogue responses when asking to kiss spawn Astarion.
State.Name: Astarion Kiss Dialogue Fixed

State.Author: TumblingLemmings
State.Description: Buffs dual wielding by allowing main-hand attack to trigger off-hand attack without spending bonus actions.
State.Name: Better Dual Wielding

State.Author: Kvalyr
State.Description: Adds visual notifications to tell the player when they should long rest due to camp night events and dialogues waiting to play out.
State.Name: Camp Event Notifications

State.Author: fasterdisasters
State.Description: A collection of 23 reusable new dyes and dye remover with custom icons.
State.Name: Disastrous Dyes

State.Author: Parrot
State.Description: Rework and quality of life tweaks for shields.
State.Name: Gear Revised Shields

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes flow of dialogue when asking Minsc - "I'd like to know a little more about you".
State.Name: Minsc Dialogue Flow Fix

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Reduces repetitive NPC banter by introducing delays before they repeat. Fully configurable through MCM.
State.Name: Reduce NPC Banter Repetitiveness

State.Author: wesslen
State.Description: Fixes scaling/conditional bonuses applied by several armour mods not working correctly after loading.
State.Name: Universal Armour Fixer

State.Author: aglowinthefield
State.Description: Advanced download management for hoarders like me. Bulk mod installation, duplicate deletion, and more! Speed improvements to come as a fast follow~
State.Name: MO2 Download Manager Plus

State.Author: NiverMK
State.Description: Automatically disables e-cores for game process.
State.Name: E-Cores Excluder

State.Author: Dragozino
State.Description: A Mod Organizer 2 Plugin for Baldur's Gate 3 that offers multiple features including load order generation.
State.Name: Baldur's Gate 3 - Unofficial MO2 Support

State.Author: Magnetuning
State.Description: Fixes Astarion's missing reaction lines for other romances.
State.Name: Astarion Romance Reactions Fixed

State.Author: TumblingLemmings
State.Description: Buffs dual wielding by allowing main-hand attack to trigger off-hand attack without spending bonus actions.
State.Name: Better Dual Wielding

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Full collection of my map improvements - minimap widget scaling, no grid/shroud on the map, new better NPC markers and more.
State.Name: Better Maps All-In-One

State.Author: Grimsyxd
State.Description: All 41 original dye icons replaced with more accurate representations of their colors after combining them with your equip
State.Name: Distinctive Dyes

State.Author: JiMarti
State.Description: Makes gold weight absolutely nothing.
State.Name: Gold Weights Nothing

Original.Name: Minthara Romance Scene - Fixes and Changes-8411-1-0-1711933481.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes and Changes to Minthara's Romance Scene
State.Name: Minthara Romance Scene - Fixes and Changes

State.Author: Korakys
State.Description: Changes all ability granting items to give relative increases rather than fixed values, e.g. Gloves of Dexterity gives +4 Dex instead of 18 Dex.
State.Name: Relative Ability Boost Items

State.Author: StuddMuffinn
State.Description: This mod fixes the broken Shield Bash reaction in the game.
State.Name: Shield Bash Fix

State.Author: Ersh
State.Description: Native open source plugin providing several camera tweaks. Unlocked camera pitch, zoom, controller stick deadzone. No separate executables. Configurable.
State.Name: Native Camera Tweaks

Original.Name: Auntie Ethel - Dark Urge Dialogue Bug Fix (NoPrio)-8363-1-0-NoPrio-1711971985.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes bugs with Auntie Ethel's scene in the grove when playing as the Dark Urge.
State.Name: Auntie Ethel - Dark Urge Dialogue Bug Fix (with Optional Astarion Priority)

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes dyeing UI faster and more convenient and dyes more recognizable in inventory.
State.Name: Slightly Better Dyeing (with all dye mods support)

State.Author: Sailor Cat
State.Description: Summon won't end its turn? Forcibly end the current turn or combat with these Script Extender console commands.
State.Name: Combat Console Commands

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Dynamically scales party portraits on sidebar to allow them fit the screen without scrolling. Up to 16 characters in party supported.
State.Name: Dynamic Sidebar

State.Author: Asha
State.Description: Silly little mod to slightly change Gortash's hair to make it longer and closer to his concept art hair.
State.Name: Gortash Concept Art Hair

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Provides an in-game graphical interface that allows players to intuitively manage mod settings and custom mod widgets.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

Original.Name: Shadowheart Idol of Shar Kiss Bug Fix-7396-2-1-1726610222.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes missing kiss bug when gifting Shadowheart the Idol of Shar.
State.Name: Shadowheart Idol of Shar Kiss Bug Fix

State.Author: jonhinkerton
State.Description: Tired of switching to Astarion everytime you find a chest? This mod lets the active character use the highest bonus to sleight of hand in the party when picking locks, disarming traps, and picking pockets.
State.Name: Use Best Sleight of Hand

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description:
Automatically initiate lockpicking when interacting with locked chests and doors if you don't have the key. 

Configurable through a JSON file.
State.Name: Auto Lockpicking

State.Author: kobaldJuno
State.Description: Feeling like Robe of the Weave isn't enough? Here you go
State.Name: Better end game caster Robe

State.Author: Zehtuka
State.Description: This mod enhances enemy abilities, spells, and buffs with easy user configuration. It allows you to adjust combat difficulty and modify it to your specific needs as a player.
State.Name: Combat Extender

State.Author: Armarui
State.Description: Selecting the Wildheart subclass now grants you access to each Bestial Heart. You can attune to a different animal each time you Rage, and you can change Bestial Hearts while raging as a bonus action without expending an additional Rage Charge.
State.Name: Dynamic Wildheart Barbarian

State.Author: cetriolo
State.Description:
An absolute fraud in a very nice coat — and not-so-nice boots. 

A simple edit to make Tyrannical Jackboots match the rest of Gortash's outfit.
State.Name: Gortash's Matching Boots - Fix His Clown-Red Faux Pas

State.Author: Cheek
State.Description: Due to an incorrect shapeshift rule, your Dream Guardian probably didn't show up when fighting against the Emperor if you customised their appearance. This mod fixes that by changing the shapeshift rule to no longer ignore custom looks!
State.Name: Show me my Dream Guardian

State.Author: PlainOldCookies
State.Description: In dialogue skill checks, use the highest modifier in your party.
State.Name: Use Highest Modifier in dialogue

State.Author: kassent
State.Description: This is NativeModLoader, used to load any native dll plugins within bin\NativeMods\ folder.
State.Name: Native Mod Loader

State.Author: Ch4nKyy
State.Description: Explore Faerûn in an immersive Third-Person-View and use WASD to move your Heroes.
State.Name: WASD Character Movement

State.Author: FallenStar
State.Description: Automatically sells items which have no use for their (estimated) sell price, includes most if not all common junk/valuable/decorative/jewelry items, Now (mostly) configurable in game!, Say goodbye to inventory clutter!
State.Name: Auto Loot Seller V3

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Increases number of slots on a hotbar's grid and adds one more slot category to main deck. Plus a few minor  QoL improvements.
State.Name: Better Hotbar 2

Original.Name: Companions Panel and Camp Chest Everywhere-4968-1-2-3-1725606224.zip

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Improves Companions Panel, makes it (and Camp Chest) available from anywhere.
State.Name: Companions Panel and Camp Chest Everywhere

State.Author: Parrot
State.Description: Minor quality of life tweaks for elixirs and potions.
State.Name: Elixirs Revised

Original.Name: Halsin - Tell Me About Yourself - Player Responses-8042-1-2-1-1712764347.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Additional answers for non-origin characters when Halsin asks you to tell him something about yourself.
State.Name: Halsin - Tell Me About Yourself - Additional Player Responses

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Allows easily uninstalling mods, making it possible to remove them from the load order, via the MCM window or SE console.
State.Name: Mod Uninstaller

State.Author: reyqune
State.Description: Launches the game without any splash screen or audio from the splash screen video, goes directly to the main menu
State.Name: Silent No Splash Screen

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: A library mod for my other mods. Forked from Focus Core.
State.Name: Volition Cabinet

State.Author: wes47
State.Description: Changes all ingame mouse cursors to look like the ones from Baldur's Gate 2.
State.Name: BG2 Mouse Cursors

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Automatically send food items to a supply sack inside the camp chest. Configurable with a JSON file.
State.Name: Auto Send Food To Camp

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes inventories easier to read and organize. Adds new mini-icons, back and foregrounds to distinct useful loot from trash.
State.Name: Better Inventory UI (with Mark Books as Read support)

State.Author: BG3 Community Library Team
State.Description: This is the Compatibility Framework. Split off from BG3 Community Library, this mod provides an API for other mods to use improve compatibility. Initially designed for Subclass Compatibility, the Framework has API endpoints that Script-Extender Enabled mods can hook into to insert values into Progressions, Feats, and Lists at Runtime.
State.Name: Compatibility Framework

State.Author: Laruses
State.Description: A tiny animation replacement to makes some elves sit up to trance, the way they did in early access.
State.Name: Elves Sit to Trance

Original.Name: IWT - For Better Hotbar 2 - Hide Looted-5342-1-3-1709148064.zip

State.Author: Proxa Djmr and Zee
State.Description: Enhances visual feedback and improves ease of use when using the "Show all items" in-game functionality. Official combination of 2 previous mods "Enhanced World Tooltips" and "ImprovedUI Showallitems"
State.Name: Improved World Tooltips

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description:
Fixes dialogue with Mol. 



If you Stole Mattis' Ring, Grabbed Silfy etc... you will have to persuade Mol to give you another chance. However, after persuading, Mol refuses to talk to you.
State.Name: Mol Persuasion Bug Fix

State.Author: JuuM
State.Description: Cunning Action is now a passive that changes the resource cost dynamically. Also covers Ranger and Monk.
State.Name: Smart Cunning Action

State.Author: FallenStar
State.Description:
Magical healing potions that look for any available healing potion of the same type in the party's inventory for convenience, no more splitting potion or looking for them inside 50 bags



May activate your 5G chip.
State.Name: Wifi potions v2 tm

Original.Name: Norbyte's Baldur's Gate 3 Beta Script Extender-2172-2024April-30-1715333040.7z

State.Author: Norbyte
State.Description: This is the Norbyte's Baldur's Gate 3 Script Extender but the difference is that is Vortex Ready. You just need to downloaded it with Vortex and select "BG3 BG3SE" (this should already be activated by default).
State.Name: Norbyte's Baldur's Gate 3 Script Extender

Original.Name: Auto Send Read Books To Camp 2.0.1-7035-2-0-1-1725549135.zip

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Automatically send read books to the camp chest or mark them as wares. Configurable with a JSON file.
State.Name: Auto Send Read Books To Camp

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Full collection of my map improvements - minimap widget scaling, no grid/shroud on the map, new better NPC markers and more.
State.Name: Better Maps All-In-One

State.Author: FallenStar
State.Description: You can now move faster and can configure how much faster you go, pretty cool right? Yeah? Yeah. Default is doubled speed
State.Name: Configurable movement speed - now for enemies too

Original.Name: Encrusted With Frost Spell Save DC-7593-1-0-1709637819.zip

State.Author: BOZNAZ
State.Description: Changes the difficulty class of the freezing effect from the encrusted with frost status to scale based on your spell save DC to make it easier to freeze enemies.
State.Name: Encrusted With Frost Spell Save DC Scaling

State.Author: AlanaSP ShinyHobo Djmr and Zee
State.Description: Changes existing UI to enhance the current modding scene by removing intrusive in-game warning and enhancing character creation options. Also provides optional files that replace UI elements based on player feedback
State.Name: ImprovedUI ReleaseReady

Original.Name: Mol Stolen Belongings Bug Fix (Set Flag)-1877-1-1-1718073779.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes bug where the dialogue for Mol does not appear to return your stolen belongings.
State.Name: Mol Stolen Belongings Bug Fix

State.Author: wesslen
State.Description: Sorts spell lists by level and (localised) name.
State.Name: Spell List Sorter

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes issues with Wyll's Dialogue Lines and Audio Files
State.Name: Wyll Dialogue Fixes

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Automatically use soap post-combat or when entering camp, if available in party member's inventory. Optional soap delivery to camp chest. Configurable via JSON.
State.Name: Auto Use Soap

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Full collection of my map improvements - minimap widget scaling, no grid/shroud on the map, new better NPC markers and more.
State.Name: Better Maps All-In-One

State.Author: Varnion
State.Description: Whenever an attacker makes a critical miss, the target can make an attack of opportunity against it.
State.Name: Critical Miss Has Consequences

State.Author: Magnetuning
State.Description: Finishes Wyll's unfinished kiss interaction from the epilogue! Give your beloved folk hero all the kisses he deserves.
State.Name: Epilogue Kisses For Wyll

Original.Name: Increased throw weight and range from enlarge 2x-8091-1-1-1710947016.zip

State.Author: BOZNAZ
State.Description: Makes the enlarge status increase the amount of weight you can throw and the range at which you can throw an object/creature. The multiplier stacks when stacking elixir of the colossus with other sources of enlarge. There are 3 options available for +25%, +50% and +100% multiplier.
State.Name: Increased throw weight and range from enlarge

Original.Name: Moonrise Towers Tadpole Cargo Dialogue Bug Fix-8015-1-0-1710639344.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes bug with Illithid and True Soul dialogue options.
State.Name: Moonrise Towers Tadpole Cargo Dialogue Bug Fix

State.Author: Cephelos
State.Description: In the vanilla game, effects that increase your carry weight do not stack. With this mod, they will.
State.Name: Stacking Carry Weight

State.Author: Magnetuning
State.Description: Fixes a bug preventing you from getting a very sweet scene with Wyll and Minsc after you recruit Minsc.
State.Name: Wyll Meets Minsc Fix

Original.Name: Yet Another Script Extender Configuration Option 2-7283-1-0-1709142066.zip

State.Author: Norbyte
State.Description: These are simple configurations for Script Extender, which basically is where you have the Achievements or/and Console enabled, since those are the most requested settings.
State.Name: Yet Another Script Extender Configuration

State.Author: Sumradagnoth
State.Description: Implements a RAW faithful version of Reckless Attack for the base Barbarian class (and subclasses).  I got tired of doing half-fixes in my Barbarian subclass mods, so I made this for efficiency and included a full fix for the way BG3 does the ability.
State.Name: 5e Reckless Attack

State.Author: Cyclonic
State.Description: Automatically hide summons when the character they are attached to enters stealth
State.Name: Automatically Hide Summons

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes split item menu more responsive and adds min/max button.
State.Name: Slightly Better Split Item Menu

State.Author: Baldurs_Goonsack
State.Description: Whenever an attacker makes a Critical Miss, the target can make a free Attack of Opportunity against it. Includes ranged/cantrip support.
State.Name: Critical Miss Has Consequences FIXED

State.Author: Mithras666
State.Description: Fully modular, easy to configure Autosave mod. Triggers Autosaves on the chosen events, such as "Combat Started", "Entered Camp".
State.Name: Event Autosave - MCM

State.Author: Mithras666
State.Description:
Fix for the pesky bug where enemies just stare at you for 20 seconds without ending their turn. 

Ends enemy turns automatically with configurable timers.
State.Name: Infinite Turn Fix

State.Author: Bluesatin
State.Description: Fixes multiclass characters using the wrong casting-ability when using generic effects like scrolls, illithid powers, items etc.
State.Name: Multiclass Preferred Casting Ability Fix

State.Author: Zarnos
State.Description: This mod prevents other versions of Bless from overwriting Sweet Stone Features (the buff from purchasing a statue of yourself). Most other ways of obtaining Bless only last a few turns so it makes no sense that the would overwrite Sweet Stone Features which is supposed to be permanent.
State.Name: StatueBlessFix

State.Author: Magnetuning
State.Description: Tweaks the camera in one ending of Wyll's Act 3 romance scene so you can better see his very cute cuddle animation.
State.Name: Wyll's Act 3 Romance Tweaks

State.Author: pooteeweet
State.Description:
Change Gortash's head, teeth and/or hair. Loose files or .pak.  

Uses Vemperen﻿ and Dufresne12's Male Human G1 head.
State.Name: Gortash Facelift

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Additional dialogue responses when defending or raiding the grove.
State.Name: Additional Grove Raid Dialogue Options

State.Author: BG3 Community Library Team
State.Description: Baldur's Gate 3 Community Library is designed to be a set of common data that any mod may draw from. This includes Scripts, Spells, Statuses, Passives, etc.
State.Name: Baldur's Gate 3 Community Library

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Adds more contextual info to Target Info panel (resistances/vulnerabilities, item value, number of items in containers etc).
State.Name: Better Target Info

State.Author: AlanaSP
State.Description: Unlocks NPC Options in Character Creation.
State.Name: Customizer's Compendium - Patch 7 Ready

State.Author: wesslen
State.Description: Stops blade cantrips working with Extra Attack and similar features. Replacement for "Extra Attack Compatibility (EAC)." Doesn't break Honour mode.
State.Name: Extra Attack Fix SE

State.Author: PrimalFire
State.Description: Re-adjusts wet status
State.Name: Just Wet

State.Author: Cerberry
State.Description: Adjusts the amount of lip chewing and grimacing in neutral dialogue
State.Name: Neutral Facial Expressions Tweak

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes flow of dialogue when speaking to the Strange Ox after passing the arcana check without 'Speak with Animals'.
State.Name: Strange Ox - Dialogue Flow Fix

Original.Name: Yield to Temptation - Tutorial Chest Anti-Cheat-4913-1-0-0-1701871013.zip

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: No modded items in the nautiloid tutorial chest. Summoned tutorial chests still contain mod items! For everyone who can't control their dark urge and gives in to temptation when seeing the tutorial chest (and for multiplayer).
State.Name: Yield to Temptation - Tutorial Chest Anti-Cheat

State.Author: pooteeweet
State.Description:
Change Gortash's head, teeth and/or hair. Loose files or .pak.  

Uses Vemperen﻿ and Dufresne12's Male Human G1 head.
State.Name: Gortash Facelift

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes inventories easier to read and organize. Adds new mini-icons, back and foregrounds to distinct useful loot from trash.
State.Name: Better Inventory UI (with Mark Books as Read support)

Original.Name: Be nice to Skoona (Elfsong Half-Orc) Dialogue Edit-8764-1-0-1713129283.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: You can now be nice to Enforcer Skoona.
State.Name: Be Nice to Skoona (Elfsong Half-Orc) Dialogue Edit

State.Author: Caites and juumeijin
State.Description: Adds new information to tooltips and makes tooltips more readable. Also sort of framework for Artifact rarity.
State.Name: Better Tooltips

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Improves cursor text panel - adds damage numbers, damage type icons and warns about replacing concentration spell.
State.Name: Better Cursor Text Panel

State.Author: AstralSprout
State.Description: Adds new, unlimited-use dyes to the game!
State.Name: Extra Dyes for the Fashionable Folk of Faerun

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes "Free Lae'zel" quest not completing when Recruiting Lae'zel and sending her to camp.
State.Name: Lae'zel Recruitment Bug Fix

Original.Name: No Press Any Key Menu for MCM-745-1-7-6-1725805506.zip

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: No "Press Any Key to continue" stop to Main menu.
State.Name: No Press Any Key Menu

State.Author: Cytraen
State.Description: Removes the need to rest between uses of tadpole/illithid dialogue options.
State.Name: Tadpole Dialogue Without Resting

State.Author: hdtruce
State.Description: Makes Enver Gortash the "handsome younger man with an easy smile" that we daydream about !
State.Name: Gortash Refined

State.Author: Bluesatin
State.Description: Makes changes to common push/pull effects from skills, allowing them to be angled slightly to the left/right when used.
State.Name: Adjustable Shove-Pull Targeting

State.Author: Caites and Sniffx
State.Description: Improves character sheet panel and TAB party panel.
State.Name: Better Character and Party Panels

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Improves initiative tracker - makes it tighter and adds more info about combatants.
State.Name: Slightly Better Topbar

State.Author: Dajolie
State.Description:
This mod fixes banter for Dark Urge. 

Now Dark Urge will react to world events and interact with companions as often as Tav.
State.Name: Dark Urge Banter Dialogue Fixes

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Automatically helps companions who get stuck or fall behind due to broken pathfinding by teleporting them or briefly boosting their jumps. 'Teleport Party To You', but autonomous.
State.Name: Fix Stragglers

State.Author: commanderstrawberry
State.Description: Makes females emote less dramatically by editing wrinkle map. Now with some males!
State.Name: Less Wrinkled Expression and Forehead for Face

State.Author: Clowee
State.Description: Your appearance stays the same after receiving Ethel's eye (both left and right work)
State.Name: Normal Hag's Eye

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Allows you to trade with any NPC you can talk to.
State.Name: Trade With Anyone

State.Author: weavebitch
State.Description: Replaces Gortash's boots with a (slightly) less ugly pair. No re-texture, just a modified model.
State.Name: Less Ugly Kicks (Gortash Boots Replacer)

State.Author: UndefinedScribble
State.Description: Removes the bras from dragonborn underwear.
State.Name: And Hold the Bra - A Dragonborn Underwear Mod

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes combat log tighter and draggable. Auto-hide and different scale versions available.
State.Name: Better Combat Log 2

State.Author: Caites and desirecampbell
State.Description: Increases trade/barter grids and adds ability to choose and drag multiple items/stacks in Barter Mode.
State.Name: Slightly Better Trade Menu

State.Author: wesslen
State.Description: Speeds up loading by cleaning up database entries left behind by destroyed characters (mostly summons.) Especially impactful in Honour mode.
State.Name: Database Cleaner

Original.Name: Flind - True Soul Dialogue Bug Fix-7307-1-0-1709208462.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes bug when speaking to Flind as a True Soul.
State.Name: Flind - True Soul Dialogue Bug Fix

State.Author: Clowee
State.Description: Removes Half-Illithid eyes and lessens the intensity of the scarring. If you want to fully remove the scarring, use my other mod, 'Normal Half Illithid'.
State.Name: Lighter Half Illithid

State.Author: Clowee
State.Description: Your appearance stays the same after receiving Volo's eye
State.Name: Normal Volo's Eye

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Enables trading with Withers. Optional files add a bunch of items in his inventory and allow you to make your own treasure table.
State.Name: Trade with Withers - Fully modular and customizable treasure tables

State.Author: Eralyne
State.Description: Enables changing ANY character's body type and race, as well as editing Origin characters in the Mirror.
State.Name: Appearance Edit Enhanced

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Increases default size of container's grid available without scaling. Plus a few QoL improvements.
State.Name: Better Containers

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes small widgets great again.
State.Name: Better Various Widgets

State.Author: MegaCoolBlood
State.Description: Disables the combat log for the "Burning" Effect, so that your log is not spammed by candles
State.Name: Disable combat log for Burning

Original.Name: Gale Spell Teaching Scene - Ability Check Bug Fix-7863-1-0-1710298690.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Changes ability checks that are used during Gale's Spell Teaching Scene.
State.Name: Gale Spell Teaching Scene - Ability Check Changes

State.Author: JiMarti
State.Description: Make Longstrider from a Target type of spell to an Area type of Spell.
State.Name: Longstrider AOE - Patch 7 Compatible

State.Author: xmas214
State.Description: Ever unintentionally break a Paladin oath / keep pissing off Karlach / repeatedly pick the hardest skill checks / say something Gale took as a pick-up line?  OIO is here for you.
State.Name: OIO - Overexplained Interaction Options

State.Author: Kriana and Yakuzadeso
State.Description: Sure, you can sell Withers your junk, but what if you just need a healing potion?
State.Name: Trade with Withers Add-on - Essential Supplies

State.Author: Eralyne
State.Description: Enables changing ANY character's body type and race, as well as editing Origin characters in the Mirror.
State.Name: Appearance Edit Enhanced

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Adds icons for contextual actions and makes widget slimmer and snappier.
State.Name: Better Context Menu

State.Author: MegaCoolBlood
State.Description: Disables the combat log for Crusader's Mantle, so that you are not spammed with Log Notifications anymore
State.Name: Disable combat log for Crusader's Mantle

State.Author: Cerberry
State.Description: Fixes Gale's last kiss in the endgame
State.Name: Gale's High Hall Kiss Fix

State.Author: kharneth
State.Description: Turns Mage Armour inactive instead of removing it when you equip armor, and reactivate it when you unequip armor.
State.Name: Mage Armour - Quality of Life

State.Author: Siael
State.Description: Orin's boss fight made proper. See description. SPOILER WARNING - Act 3
State.Name: Orin's True Bossfight

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Enables trading with Withers. Optional files add a bunch of items in his inventory and allow you to make your own treasure table.
State.Name: Trade with Withers - Fully modular and customizable treasure tables

State.Author: theraineydaze
State.Description: Adds Karlach to the opening Splash/Loading Screen for patch 5.
State.Name: Loading Screen with Karlach for Patch 5

Original.Name: Astarion Bugbear and Ogre Dialogue Priority-7721-1-0-1709944597.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Gives Astarion priority for his dialogue during the Bugbear and Ogre Scene.
State.Name: Astarion Bugbear and Ogre Dialogue Priority

State.Author: TumblingLemmings
State.Description: Buffs dual wielding by allowing main-hand attack to trigger off-hand attack without spending bonus actions.
State.Name: Better Dual Wielding

State.Author: bloodelf90lvl and genderwithyourmom
State.Description: Makes the trickiest cleric actually tricky!
State.Name: Blessing of the Trickster Buff

State.Author: MegaCoolBlood
State.Description: Disables the combat log for Silvanus Blessing, so that you are not spammed with Log Notifications anymore
State.Name: Disable combat log for Silvanus Blessing

State.Author: Parrot
State.Description: Rework and quality of life tweaks for footwear.
State.Name: Gear Revised Footwear

State.Author: FallenStar
State.Description:
Make read books green, also appends a configurable prefix & suffix to read books (similar books will automatically be marked as read afterward)

Based mod, I know.
State.Name: Mark books as read

State.Author: Rob Lapham
State.Description: Varies character heights by race to be more accurate with D&D source material instead of one size fits all.
State.Name: Racial Height Variation

State.Author: Eumeta
State.Description:
Delete clutter items from trader inventory after you close the trading option so when you mass-sell useless items they no longer overwhelm the trading menu.

Eldritch Tablets ? Gone

Spoons ? Gone

Skulls ? Gone

You want to add more items to the removal list ? They're gone too.
State.Name: Trader Clutter Begone
